title: LOOOOOL KATARINA balanced!
body:
http://www.lolking.net/champions/katarina&region=all&map=sr&queue=1x1&league=diamond#statistics

how the fuck is this balanced? zed's winrate is 47% across all ranks while katarina's is 55%+?!?!?!

i am fucking freaking out at how hilariously sad this is.

replies.body: especially considering kats winrate went up AFTER her nerfs, just goes to show trusting something as unreliable as winrates doesn't get you far

Winrate doesn't directly show how balanced a champion is. Some champions are easier to play than others thus their win rates will be higher. Katarina is just easy to play and quite fun yet quite strong and hard to play against if you don't know how to control your cc for her ult. So people will play her and people will win with her =)
Just above 50% with a 15% pick rate... Sounds about as average statistics for a champion that you can get.
Sir, both are garbage champs. l2P before you complain about statistics
